did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church of Montour Falls records, 1850-1869.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of Montour Falls (Montour Falls, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Register which lists members and probationers; pastors and trustees; class members, leaders and elders; baptisms, marriages, expulsions and deaths; and annual reports (1850-1855).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: "Havana Station" was the name of the Methodist Episcopal Church of Havana while it was still a charge on a circuit (not yet incorporated into society with a full time pastor). The first class was organized in 1820 and services were held in a log school house near the Episcopal church. A church formed in 1829, and the society was incorporated in 1835 in the same year as the church building was dedicated.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This register (1850-1874) contains mostly lists of church members and probationers; but it also lists pastors, trustees, class members, leaders and elders; and records baptisms, marriages, expulsions and deaths. At the end of the register are "annual reports" recording pastors' salaries (1850-1855). Many of the lists and records in this book are not in chronological order and contain several gaps in Page s and years.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of Montour Falls (Montour Falls, N.Y.)
Methodist Episcopal Church of Havana (Havana, N.Y.)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Methodist Episcopal Church of Montour Falls records, #6060. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Table of Contents, lists: quarterly conference of 1866, p. 2; revised alphabetical list, p. 34; baptisms, p. 208; marriages, p. 247; expulsions, p. 288; deaths, p. 325; Quarterly Reports, p. 368; probationers, p. 5; trustees, p. 7.
Stewards names (1866-67), class leaders (1866-67), preachers names (1866-67), stewards names (1867-68), estimating committee members, corrected list for 1868-69 of stewards and leaders.
Preacher's names and years in service.
Probationers: year dates, date received, baptized, remarks.
Probationers, 1870 : when received, baptized, received in full, remarks.
It appears that they were never there and there was probably no information on them. The same L true of all the gaps in the Register (see below).
Under the heading "Havana Station" are four entries regarding the size of church membership just before and after quarterly conference meetings held in 1850, 1851, 1852 and 1855.
Register of classes: year dates and names of leaders, stewards, local elders and trustees.
Membership list: name, class number, received on probation, baptized, received in full, received by letter, removed by letter, removed withe letter, withdrawn, discontinued, expelled, died.
Baptisms: by whom, when, name(s), whether adult or infant.
Marriages: names, where from, date, by whom.
Expulsions: only two names with dates, but no remarks

"Annual Reports" of preachers expenses. 1849 and 1850 - Amounts listed for: adult claimant (s), table expenses and fuel, parsonage provided, travelling expenses, paid in full. 1 to 1854 - Amounts listed for: adult claimant (s), children under 5, children under 14, table and gravelling expenses, minister's salary paid in full.to 1855 - Amounts listed for: quarterly claims, table expenses, total, what amount paid, how much deficient in minister's salary.
